---
execute:
  eval: false
format:
  revealjs:
    theme: simple
    menu: false
    slide-number: false
    controls: true
    progress: false
    center: true
    width: 1280
    height: 720
    margin: 0.04
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <style>
          .reveal {
              font-family: "Baskerville", "Libre Baskerville", serif;
            }
          .reveal {
              font-size: 24px; /* fx fra 26px */
            }
          .reveal {
              background: #f6f3ee;
            }
          .reveal h1,
          .reveal h2,
          .reveal h3,
          .reveal h4,
          .reveal h5,
          .reveal h6 {
            font-family: "Baskerville", "Libre Baskerville", serif;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 700;
          }
          .reveal h2 { font-size: 1.4em; margin-bottom: 0.6em; }
            .board-wrap{
              width: 92vw;
              margin: 0 auto;
              display: flex;
              flex-direction: column;
              gap: 10px;
            }
            
            /* SCOREBOARD NEDERST */
            .scoreboard{
              width: 2000000%;
              display: flex;
              justify-content: center;
              gap: 2px;
              margin-top: 6px;
            }
            
            /* G√òR HOLD-BOKSE SM√Ö */
            .team{
              width: 100px;
              padding: 6px 8px;
              gap: 40px;
              font-size: 0.8em;
            }
            
            .team-title{
              font-size: 0.9em;
            }
            
            .team-score{
              font-size: 1.3em;
            }
            
            .team-buttons{
              gap: 6px;
            }
            
            .score-btn{
              padding: 4px 8px;
              font-size: 0.8em;
            }
            
          .board-grid{
            display:grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            grid-template-rows: auto repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 12px;
            width: 92vw;
            height: 70vh;
            margin: 0 auto;
          }

          .board-grid .header{
            border: 3px solid rgba(92, 64, 51, 0.6);
            border-radius: 80px;
            background: #FFF;
            display:flex;
            align-items:center;
            justify-content:center;
            text-align:center;
            padding: 10px;
            font-size: 0.95em;
            font-weight: bold;
          }

          .board-grid .cell{
            border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
            border-radius: 80px;
            background: #e6eef7;
            display:flex;
            align-items:center;
            justify-content:center;
            font-size: 1.4em;
          }

          .board-grid .cell a{
            width:100%;
            height:100%;
            display:flex;
            align-items:center;
            justify-content:center;
            text-decoration:none;
            color:#000;
          }
          
          .board-grid .cell a {
            font-weight: 400;              /* fjerner ‚Äúfed‚Äù look */
            letter-spacing: 0.02em;        /* valgfrit ‚Äì g√∏r det mere elegant */
            font-variant-numeric: lining-nums; /* g√∏r 100‚Äì500 visuelt ens */
          }
          
          .board-grid .cell.used{
          .background: none !important;
          }
          
          .board-grid .cell.used a{
            background: #bdbdbd !important;
            color:#555 !important;
          }
          
          /* Fjern fast baggrund p√• cellen */
          .board-grid .cell {
            background: none;
          }
          
          /* S√∏rg for runde hj√∏rner p√• selve feltet */
          .board-grid .cell a {
            border-radius: 80px;
          }
          
          /* 100 */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell$="-100"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #e6eef7, #dbe6f5);
          }
          
          /* 200 */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell$="-200"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #dbe6f5, #cbdaf0);
          }
          
          /* 300 */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell$="-300"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #cbdaf0, #b7cdea);
          }
          /* Kun kategori 5: 300-ish (300, 303, 305 osv.) */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell^="k5-301"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #cbdaf0, #b7cdea);
          }
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell^="k5-302"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #cbdaf0, #b7cdea);
          }
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell^="k5-303"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #cbdaf0, #b7cdea);
          }
          
          /* 400 */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell$="-400"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #b7cdea, #9fb8e0);
          }
          
          /* 500 */
          .board-grid .cell[data-cell$="-500"] a {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #9fb8e0, #879fd4);
            font-weight: bold;
          }
          .board-grid .cell a:hover{
            filter: brightness(0.97);
          }
          /* === FJERN FED FRA TALFELTER === */
          .board-grid .cell a {
            font-weight: 400 !important;        /* normal v√¶gt */
            letter-spacing: 0.02em;             /* valgfrit ‚Äì g√∏r det mere elegant */
            font-variant-numeric: lining-nums;  /* ensartede 100‚Äì500 */
          }

          .mark-used-btn {
            font-family: "Baskerville", "Libre Baskerville", serif;
            font-size: 1em;
            padding: 12px 26px;
            margin-top: 30px;
            cursor: pointer;
          
            border-radius: 80px;                 /* üëà samme runde look */
            border: 2px solid rgba(92, 64, 51, 0.6);
            background: #faf0e6;
            color: #000;
          
            transition: all 0.15s ease;
          }

          .scoreboard{
            width: 92vw;
            margin: 10px auto 16px auto;
            display:flex;
            gap:50px;
            justify-content:center;
            align-items:stretch;
          }
          .team{
            border: 3px solid rgba(92, 64, 51, 0.6);
            border-radius: 80px;
            padding:10px 55px;
            min-width:320px;
            background:#fff;
            display:flex;
            flex-direction:row;
            gap:55px;
          }
          .team-title{ font-weight:bold; text-align:center; }
          .team-score{ font-size:1.6em; text-align:center; }
          .team-buttons{ display:flex; gap:8px; justify-content:center; }
          .score-btn{ font-size:0.9em; padding:8px 10px; cursor:pointer; }
          /* === SCOREBOARD ‚Äì ENDGYLDIG STYLING === */

        .score-btn {
          font-family: "Baskerville", "Libre Baskerville", serif !important;
          font-size: 0.9em;
          padding: 6px 12px;
          border: 1px solid rgba(80, 60, 40, 0.4);
          background: #faf0e6;
          border-radius: 6px;
          cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .score-btn:hover {
          background: #f0e4d6;
        }
        
        .team-buttons {
          display: flex;
          gap: 8px;
          align-items: center;
        }
        </style>
    include-after-body:
      text: |
        <script>
          (function () {
            const USED_KEY = "jeopardy_used_cells";
            const SCORE_KEY = "jeopardy_scores";

            function getUsed() {
              try { return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(USED_KEY) || "[]"); }
              catch(e) { return []; }
            }

            function setUsed(arr) {
              localStorage.setItem(USED_KEY, JSON.stringify(Array.from(new Set(arr))));
            }

            function applyUsed() {
              const used = new Set(getUsed());
              document.querySelectorAll('[data-cell]').forEach(el => {
                const id = el.getAttribute('data-cell');
                if (used.has(id)) el.classList.add('used');
              });
            }

            window.markUsedAndReturn = function(cellId) {
              const used = getUsed();
              used.push(cellId);
              setUsed(used);
              applyUsed();
              if (window.Reveal) Reveal.slide(0);
              else window.location.hash = "#/top";
            };

            function getScores() {
              try { return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(SCORE_KEY) || '{"t1":0,"t2":0}'); }
              catch(e) { return { t1: 0, t2: 0 }; }
            }

            function setScores(s) {
              localStorage.setItem(SCORE_KEY, JSON.stringify(s));
            }

            function renderScores() {
              const s = getScores();
              const t1 = document.getElementById("score-t1");
              const t2 = document.getElementById("score-t2");
              if (t1) t1.textContent = s.t1;
              if (t2) t2.textContent = s.t2;
            }

            window.addPoints = function(team, delta) {
              const s = getScores();
              if (team === 1) s.t1 += delta;
              if (team === 2) s.t2 += delta;
              setScores(s);
              renderScores();
            };

            window.resetScores = function() {
              setScores({ t1: 0, t2: 0 });
              renderScores();
            };

            function initAll() {
              applyUsed();
              renderScores();
            }

            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", initAll);
            if (window.Reveal) {
              Reveal.on("ready", initAll);
              Reveal.on("slidechanged", initAll);
            }
          })();
        </script>
